strongs_def: to be a friend to (fond of (an individual or an object)), i.e. have affection for (denoting personal attachment, as a matter of sentiment or feeling; while G25 (φιλέω) is wider, embracing especially the judgment and the deliberate assent of the will as a matter of principle, duty and propriety: the two thus stand related very much as G2309 (φιλέω) and G1014 (φιλέω), or as G2372 (φιλέω) and G3563 (φιλέω) respectively; the former being chiefly of the heart and the latter of the head); specially, to kiss (as a mark of tenderness)
outline:
1. to love
    1. to approve of
    2. to like
    3. sanction
    4. to treat affectionately or kindly, to welcome, befriend
  2. to show signs of love
    1. to kiss
  3. to be fond of doing
    1. be wont, use to do
